location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 102 to John Griffith, Resident and Samuel Manesty, Factor at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports that there is no further news from the Meer Ally Khan, the Calantar [Kalantar or Mayor] of Genowa (Bandar-e Ganaveh) regarding the Bussora [Basra] boat wrecked near Genowa and the property that was subsequently seized. The movements of the BombayGrab and the arrival of the Morning Starare discussed. The letter also congratulates Griffith on his appointment as Resident of Bussora.
